title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
OB: The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: After modifying the font size of the label, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
3. Observe the label height to see if it adjusts accordingly.
